participant_1.background:
I once spent a week in a cabin in the mountains in the middle of winter and loved every minute of it.
I go for a walk with my dogs every day.
I'm a touring musician, but I also like gardening.
i have an above average iq.
I've had to give up some of my favorite foods to get healthy.

participant_2.background:
I have a cat and he is the light of my life.
I sometimes trip over my own feet when I'm playing tennis.
i have 5 brothers and sisters.
my favorite band is the rolling stones.
I have moved a lot, but I always take my favorite green clothes with me.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing alright, thanks for asking! How about you?
Pretty good, thanks! I just finished a week-long trip to the mountains and I'm feeling very refreshed.
That sounds amazing! I love spending time in the mountains. I have a cat and he loves to play outside, so we always take him with us when we go hiking.
That's so cute! I have two dogs, and they love to go for walks in the woods, too.
Do you like to play music?
I do! I'm a touring musician, and I love playing live shows.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to express yourself.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk to people about music.
Me too! It's one of my favorite things to talk about.
The Rolling Stones are my favorite band!
Mine too! I love their music.
Yeah, they're one of the best bands of all time.
I agree! They're definitely one of my biggest influences.
That's awesome! I'm always happy to meet someone who's into the same music as me.
